alert.note: Alert for Mariposa Madera Foothills; Mariposa-Madera Lower Sierra; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 5:12PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...Isolated thunderstorms and heavy rain will impact portions of west central Mariposa, southwestern Tuolumne and northeastern Merced Counties through 545 PM PDT... At 510 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking isolated thunderstorms and an area of heavy rain along a line extending from 9 miles south of La Grange to 10 miles north of South Dos Palos. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Merced, Atwater, Winton, Planada and Lake McClure. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Mariposa Madera Foothills; Mariposa-Madera Lower Sierra; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling
